name: Don't Sink!
description:
Developed in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The Theme was "Out of Control" & we decided to go with the common cartoon trope of trying to plug a hole in a sinking ship, only for more to pop up.

Controls:

  • WASD to Move.
  • Space to Dash.
  • Right Click to board up holes.
  • Left Click to bail water with the bucket.

Please feel free to let us know how we did.

Thanks,

Giggles & Glasses
